Module com.example.project3
Package com.example.project3

Class MoneyMarket

java.lang.Object
com.example.project3.Account
com.example.project3.Savings
com.example.project3.MoneyMarket
public class MoneyMarket extends Savings
This class is for a Money Market Account that extends the Savings class. Calculates the monthly interest and fees, depending on the loyalty, minimum balance, and withdrawals of the customer.
Author:
Minseok Park, Amogh Sarangdhar

  • Constructor Details

    • MoneyMarket

      public MoneyMarket​(String fname, String lname, String dob, double balance)
      Parametrized constructor to create a Money Market account for GUI program This takes a firstname, lastname, dob, as strings, and balance as double.
      Parameters:
      fname - first name of the holder.
      lname - last name of the holder.
      dob - date of birth of the holder.
      balance - balance in the account of the holder.

    • MoneyMarket

      public MoneyMarket​(String transaction)
      Parametrized constructor for Money Market account that takes an input String from terminal, and tokenizes it. Defaults customer to a loyal customer.
      Parameters:
      transaction - takes inputString from the terminal for Money Market account.

  • Method Details

    • monthlyInterest

      public double monthlyInterest()
      Calculates the monthly interest for a Money Market account.
      Overrides:
      monthlyInterest in class Savings
      Returns:
      higher monthly interest if the balance is greater than minimum balance.

    • fee

      public double fee()
      Calculates the fees for Money Market account. If the numberofWithdrawals is less than 3 or balance exceeds minimum balance then fee is waived.
      Overrides:
      fee in class Savings
      Returns:
      monthly fee if numberofWithdrawals exceeds 3.

    • getType

      public String getType()
      Getter for the type of account (Money Market).
      Overrides:
      getType in class Savings
      Returns:
      "Money Market Savings" which is the type of account.

    • getTypeCode

      public int getTypeCode()
      Getter for ACCOUNT_TYPE_CODE.
      Overrides:
      getTypeCode in class Savings
      Returns:
      the type code of the Account (=3 for Money Market).

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw​(double amount)
      The amount of money needed to withdraw from an account. Also, increments the numOfWithdrawals.
      Overrides:
      withdraw in class Account
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount required to be withdrawn.

    • deposit

      public void deposit​(double amount)
      The amount of money that is to be deposited into the Account (Money Market)
      Overrides:
      deposit in class Account
      Parameters:
      amount - money to be deposited. Also change loyality if the balance goes back to >= 2500.

    • isValid_O

      public boolean isValid_O()
      Check validity of an opening transaction (Money Market)
      Overrides:
      isValid_O in class Account
      Returns:
      false, if it has invalid profile or balance < 2500; true, otherwise
